Text:
The heartwarming adventure of a robot who keeps promises.

m: 8/10
YIFY normally I am a big fan but this one is slow as shit. But 6 Hrs on this when the 600 version you had up took 8 minutes with a lot less seeders? What up with that?

V=10 A=10 M=10 Thanks!SEEDING!!!
